cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) category as it deals with person re-identification, which is a subfield of computer vision. It also involves deep metric learning, which is a popular technique in computer vision research. 

The paper also involves the use of a deep neural network and metric learning loss functions, which are commonly used in machine learning research. Therefore, it could also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) category. 

The paper also involves the use of a soft hard-mining scheme, which is a technique used in multimedia (cs.MM) research. 

The paper also involves the use of adaptive weighting, which is a technique used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research. 

Finally, the paper also involves the evaluation of the proposed method's robustness, which is a topic of interest in cryptography and security (cs.CR) research.
